name: holodex
description: Holochain application indexing engine for distributed apps which run on holochains

scripts.build: copyfiles --flat ./src_dna/*.json ./build/src_dna && find src_dna -type d -mindepth 1 -exec sh -c 'mkdir ./build/src_dna/$(basename {}) && babel {} --out-file ./build/src_dna/$(basename {})/$(basename {}).js' \; && find src_dna -mindepth 2 -name "*.json" -exec cp {} build/`basename {}` \; && mv ./build/src_dna ./build/dna

author: Holo Interns 2018
